description:
Under Gaius`s command, the Amidonian army launches a full-scale attack to retake Van, but Souma and his forces move to stop them. In the aftermath of the war, there are serious consequences to be faced and plans for reconciliation to be put into action.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Lass einen Ausweg offen, wenn du eine Armee umzingelst
When You Surround an Army, Leave an Outlet Free
À une ennemi encerclé, vous devez laisser une voie de sortie
囲師には必ず闕[ひら]く
